channel.title: My crafting is giving me runecrafting xp? help fix plz
channel.description:
I have been going back n fourth coding stats trying to make there xp faster + making a custom skiller zone all day and some how i guess i messed my coding up, but somehow i made it to were you get runecrafting while crafting. -can somebody please tell me what i did wrong(so i dont do again) and/or tell me how to fix it.
P.S.: also if you know what i need to search for to find crafting xp so i can make it faster please let me know.(:

item.title: My crafting is giving me runecrafting xp? help fix plz
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

yea but have to search n find the skill but each 1 you search somthing else to find n i cant find them all.

and nowâ€¦ i messed up somthing so when you craft gems it gives runecrafting xp

item.title: My crafting is giving me runecrafting xp? help fix plz
item.dc:creator: @RSVault RSVault
item.description:
@RSVault wrote:

Look at the numbers in the line of code where it gives you EXP. Each skill has a certain number.
